column1: Bar√£o de Cocais is a Brazilian municipality located in the state of Minas Gerais. Its population as of 2006 is estimated to be 28
column2: 432 people living in an altitude between 682 and 1425 meters. The area of the municipality is 340.675 square kilometres (131.535 sq mi). The city belongs to the mesoregion Metropolitana de Belo Horizonte and to the microregion of Itabira.

column1: The municipality contains the Gongo Soco mine
column2: once a gold mine and later a large iron ore operation
